description.narrative: 1) Promoting Credible Electoral Process; 2) Improving the Democratic quality of Political Engagement; 3) Enhancing Participation by Women, Youth and other Marginalized Groups; and 4) Strengthening Channels for Civic Engagement.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

provider-org.narrative: Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Trade of the Republic of korea

condition.narrative: Social and environmental sustainability will be enhanced through application of the UNDP Social and Environmental Standards (http://www.undp.org/ses) and related Accountability Mechanism (http://www.undp.org/secu-srm).
UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

description.narrative: 1. Extent to which Credible, Transparent and Sustainable Electoral Processes has been established. 2. Extent to which there is an Improvement in the Democratic Quality of Political Engagement. 3. Extent to which there is an enhancement of the participation by Women, Youth and other marginalized groups 4. Extent to which Channels of Civic Engagement has been strengthened.

comment.narrative: 1. Partially - Credible, Transparent and Sustainable Electoral Process yet to be mainstreamed. 2. Partially - Quality of Political Engagement needs to meet the standard set in the 2012-2016 Strategic Programme of Action. 3. Partially - The Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) Gender Policy is yet to be developed 4. Partially - Relatively low levels of civic awareness of and engagement with government and elections at local and State levels.
Project operational ended. Project closure process ongoing.
